thread.title: Cockiest Move I’ve Ever Seen: Track Kid Runs A Race Blindfolded… Shockingly, It Doesn’t Go Great
thread.title_full: Cockiest Move I’ve Ever Seen: Track Kid Runs A Race Blindfolded… Shockingly, It Doesn’t Go Great

author: Feitelberg
title: Cockiest Move I’ve Ever Seen: Track Kid Runs A Race Blindfolded… Shockingly, It Doesn’t Go Great
text: Incredible move here but I gotta say, if you’re going to be so cocky that you blindfold yourself before a race then you better win that goddamn race. You better win it in a big way. I’m talking hare vs tortoise type she where you’re napping under a tree by the time all the other competitors cross the finish line. Don’t get me wrong, I’m impressed he stayed in a straight line and I respect the intimidation attempt, lord knows a white boy has to try any way he can to get in a black guy’s head before a footrace. But you’ve gotta win if you pull this. Have to. Feitelberg |
